patterns: Tell me about NGIT
NGIT information
About Neil Gogte Institute of Technology
What can you tell me about NGIT?
Share some details about NGIT with me.
Give me the lowdown on NGIT, please.
I'm interested in NGIT. Tell me about it.
Can you provide NGIT information?
Tell me more about NGIT.
I'd like to know about Neil Gogte Institute of Technology.
responses: Neil Gogte Institute of Technology (NGIT) is the first engineering college to have started after the formation of Telangana state.NGIT was started in 2017 by Keshav Memorial Technical Educational Society with the sole purpose of promoting quality Engineering Education.NGIT is a sister concern of KMIT, approved by AICTE, affiliated to Osmania University, and recognized by the Government of Telangana.NGIT offers undergraduate courses in Computer Science Engineering and Artificial Intelligence & Machine learning.

patterns: How many total seats are available per batch?
Can you provide information on the total available seats in a batch?
What is the total capacity of seats per batch?
Tell me about the overall seat availability in each batch.
Provide details about the total number of seats in a batch.
How are the seats distributed among different streams in a batch?
Give me information on the total seats available in the Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) program.
What is the seat allocation for CSE (AI & ML) in each batch?
Tell me about the specific seat distribution in the CSE program and CSE (AI & ML) program.
Can you break down the total available seats, specifying the counts for CSE and CSE (AI & ML)?
responses: Total Available seats per batch are 300. Total Seats Available in CSE are 180 and in CSE(AI&ML) are 120.

patterns: Where is NGIT located?
NGIT address
Location of Neil Gogte Institute of Technology
responses: NGIT is located in Parvathapur, Kachawanisingaram Village, Hyderabad, Telangana, India.

Share insights into the affiliations of Neil Gogte Institute of Technology with universities.
responses: Yes, NGIT is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi,It is affiliated to Osmania University (O.U), Hyderabad, and recognized by the Government of Telangana.
